Sentencas: This study demonstrates applicability of the distribution of relaxation times (DRT) methodology to reveal more precise analysis of processes that occur in solid-oxide fuel (SOFC) and electrolysis (SOEC) cells of industrial-size as well as 10-layer stacks.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: Initially, we show that before starting to interpret the data observed, it is necessary to verify the quality of the impedance data measured in order to be used for further analysis.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: For the purpose of experimental study, operating parameters were varied and their impact on the system performance was determined.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: When operating cells and stacks very similar specific frequencies were identified, whereby for the stack one additional peak was observed.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: In the fuel cell mode the main frequency ranges to link with the processes that occur were identified to be 0.01-5 Hz and 50-100 Hz.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: In the electrolysis mode, the DRT amplitudes observed are lower, but specific frequencies higher, even by a factor of 10.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: In addition, specific behaviour of DRT-peaks could be correlated to the morphological changes of the Ni-based fuel electrodes that occurred during the stability tests performed.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: Summarizing this, the results presented in this study show how to: (i) distinguish different processes, (ii) link the knowledge gained from the analysis of single-cell level and subsequently, (iii) transfer it to real stack system.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis

Sentencas: Thus, this study also represents a guideline for a detailed electrochemical performance characterization of high temperature fuel cell and electrolysis systems using the sophisticated DRT tool.
Titulo: Detailed insight into processes of reversible solid oxide cells and stacks using DRT analysis
